subject: Communication
title: The Power of the Pause
description: Learn The Power of the Pause in one minute.

hook.text: The most powerful tool in speaking isn't a word. It's the silence between them.

buildup.text: Novice speakers fill every gap with 'um,' 'like,' or 'so.' They fear silence as if it were failure.

discovery.text: A well-placed pause signals confidence, lets ideas land, and creates dramatic anticipation.

twist.text: Research shows a 2-3 second pause feels long to the speaker but perfect to the audience.

punchline.text: Silence isn't empty. It's full of meaning.
